rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0001_2
rows.name: This is the White Whale's residential unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0002
rows.name: Actually, now this place is OUR city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0003
rows.name:
We named it after the city it was modeled on.
[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0006
rows.name: And so, having welcomed one of the last survivors of humanity into our midst...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0006_m
rows.name: And so, having welcomed one of the last survivors of humanity into our midst...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0006_f
rows.name: And so, having welcomed one of the last survivors of humanity into our midst...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0007
rows.name:
On this untamed planet, Mira,
we strengthened our resolve to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Our home planet, Earth... engulfed in light
and lost forever...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0008_2
rows.name: A journey into eternity, with no possibility of return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0009
rows.name: In contrast to the clear skies over New Los Angeles,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00120100_MSG0010
rows.name:
our future remained
shrouded in a deep fog.[ST:wait ]
